mapper.select: SELECT PCOM.POST_COMMENT_ID, PCOM.COMMUNITY_ID, PCOM.MEMBER_ID, PCOM.CONTENT, PCOM.CREATE_AT, PCOM.MODIFIED_AT , MEM.NICKNAME FROM POST_COMMENT PCOM INNER JOIN MEMBER MEM ON PCOM.MEMBER_ID = MEM.MEMBER_ID WHERE PCOM.COMMUNITY_ID = #{communityId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO POST_COMMENT (POST_COMMENT_ID, COMMUNITY_ID, MEMBER_ID, CONTENT, CREATE_AT, MODIFIED_AT) VALUES(POST_COMMENT_ID_SEQ.NEXTVAL, #{communityId}, #{memberId}, #{content}, SYSDATE, NULL)
mapper.update: UPDATE POST_COMMENT SET CONTENT = #{content} , MODIFIED_AT = SYSDATE WHERE POST_COMMENT_ID = #{postCommentId}
